pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimation of Time Varying Reproduction Numbers and Restored Incidence Curves Using Variational Techniques // Estimation, by inverting a renewal equation, of time-varying reproduction numbers and restored incidence curves with festive days and weekly biases corrected as described in Alvarez et al. (2021) doi:10.1073/pnas.2105112118 and Alvarez et al. (2022) doi:10.3390/biology11040540.
